visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted rice export quantities with ideal prediction line

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram showing distribution of prediction errors (residuals)

insights: Model has extremely high MAPE (94.78%) and negative R2 (-591.41)
Only 2 samples in dataset leading to unreliable predictions
Residuals show consistent underprediction with large errors
data.summary: The model demonstrates severe prediction errors with MAPE exceeding 94% and negative R2 score. With only 2 samples in the dataset, the model lacks sufficient data to produce reliable forecasts for rice exports to Bangladesh.
data.task_answer: The model cannot reliably forecast rice exports to Bangladesh due to extremely high prediction errors (94.78% MAPE) and insufficient data (only 2 samples). The negative R2 score indicates predictions are worse than a horizontal line baseline.
